desc: Kōkua donates 10% of profits to water projects, serving underdeveloped countries. Currently, a child dies every 90 seconds from water related illness. Kōkua is actively working to provide access to clean and safe water to those without it. Join us in our mission to save lives.

layout.text: We are on a mission to end the water crisis

Eco minded products that give back with every purchase.
We are kōkua.
